title: Client download speed is slower than my little turtle!
body:
Hi guys , i've been trying to download korean client since i'll be in korea  next week, but it's going down to 0 - 100 kbps
I'm in Mexico but i mostly play in NA server so that's i've write this post here.
I have 50 Mbps download and 2Mbps upload, i have downloaded it before it's first time it gets slow :/ {{champion:34}} {{sticker:cass-cry}} 
https://imgur.com/a/IYd0R

Lol Korean client download speed:
https://imgur.com/a/mjWoR

replies.body: Ahhhh it might be going so slow due to the physical distance between you and the KR download servers. Try switching to an ethernet cable and checking off the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) of course, but you may have much better speeds once you're in the country!

Thanks for reply guy, but i haven't had problems before, i have played from Mexico with 150 ms fairly well :/ and usually downloaded the client in less than one hour, but thank you man.{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:6}} i'm done  can't play since 7:00 am :c
